医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
当您考虑健康时，请不要忘记您的眼睛我清楚地记得那个周五下午晚些时候，我的眼压飙升，我摇摇晃晃地步行到我的眼科医生办公室，视野中迅速变浓的雾气笼罩着过往的汽车和交通灯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/When-you-think-about-your-health-done28099t-forget-your-eyes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/When-you-think-about-your-health-done28099t-forget-your-eyes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e98975f7-9177-4fd4-8789-0a2c3c54d10a Fri, 22 Sep 2023 08:40:21 -0400 When you think about your health, don’t forget your eyes
新科学委员会将支持人类信托基金的“一种医学”研究由骨科兽医 Noel Fitzpatrick 教授于 2014 年创立的慈善机构 Humanimal Trust 宣布成立新的独立顾问委员会，该委员会由来自世界各地的领先人类和动物健康专业人士、学者和研究人员组成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/New-science-committee-to-support-One-Medicine-research-at-Humanimal-Trust.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/New-science-committee-to-support-One-Medicine-research-at-Humanimal-Trust.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d74bfd2e-ce7a-4553-8ec3-aae4d875eebe Fri, 22 Sep 2023 08:36:00 -0400 New science committee to support One Medicine research at Humanimal Trust
研究表明，杏仁可以成为健康减肥饮食的一部分说到减肥，坚果可能会受到不好的评价——虽然它们蛋白质含量高，但脂肪含量也很高，这往往会阻止那些想要减掉几公斤的人。但南澳大利亚大学的新研究表明，吃杏仁也可以减肥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Almonds-can-be-part-of-a-healthy-weight-loss-diet-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Almonds-can-be-part-of-a-healthy-weight-loss-diet-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7290f6b3-b6ba-4aa9-9d98-d58b8c36ba03 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 08:27:00 -0400 Almonds can be part of a healthy weight loss diet, research shows
AIHW 报告提供了子宫内膜异位症的最新患病率估计澳大利亚健康与福利研究所 (AIHW) 最新发布的报告显示，44-49 岁的女性中约有 14% 患有子宫内膜异位症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/AIHW-report-provides-the-most-recent-prevalence-estimates-on-endometriosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/AIHW-report-provides-the-most-recent-prevalence-estimates-on-endometriosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b43be437-56f9-4400-aea4-4f337c3a7500 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 08:21:00 -0400 AIHW report provides the most recent prevalence estimates on endometriosis
补充肌酸能否解决 COVID-19 后疲劳问题？在《食品科学与营养》杂志上最近发表的一项研究中，研究人员研究了肌酸补充剂作为减轻 COVID-19 后疲劳综合症临床症状的潜在干预策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Could-creatine-supplementation-be-the-answer-to-post-COVID-19-fatigue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Could-creatine-supplementation-be-the-answer-to-post-COVID-19-fatigue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c867ae4-d03e-4c03-9868-612530857a4e Fri, 22 Sep 2023 07:32:00 -0400 Could creatine supplementation be the answer to post-COVID-19 fatigue?
Atellica 解决方案组合：高度不可预测的实验室环境中的工程可预测性在这次采访中，News Med 与 Lisa Crartty 讨论了不可预测的实验室环境和工程可预测性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Atellica-Solution-Portfolio-Engineering-predictability-in-a-highly-unpredictable-lab-environment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Atellica-Solution-Portfolio-Engineering-predictability-in-a-highly-unpredictable-lab-environment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a76852d1-1f60-418e-a7f3-4005b3ccacc2 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 07:27:00 -0400 Atellica Solution Portfolio: Engineering predictability in a highly unpredictable lab environment
VAX-seq：mRNA 疫苗分析和质量保证的未来？研究人员提出了一种使用长读长测序分析 mRNA 疫苗的简化方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/VAX-seq-the-future-of-mRNA-vaccine-analysis-and-quality-assurance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/VAX-seq-the-future-of-mRNA-vaccine-analysis-and-quality-assurance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=108c9fe7-74b1-4697-8e72-c10cce0210a8 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 06:57:00 -0400 VAX-seq: the future of mRNA vaccine analysis and quality assurance?
NGS 变得毫不费力：引入 INTEGRA Biosciences 的 MIRO CANVAS INTEGRA Biosciences 很高兴地宣布推出 MIRO CANVAS，这是一款紧凑型数字微流体平台，用于全自动下一代测序 (NGS) 样品制备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/NGS-made-effortless-introducing-MIRO-CANVAS-from-INTEGRA-Biosciences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/NGS-made-effortless-introducing-MIRO-CANVAS-from-INTEGRA-Biosciences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08e9ecc7-64b6-4e6a-aa08-237c48856156 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 06:07:00 -0400 NGS made effortless: introducing MIRO CANVAS from INTEGRA Biosciences
解码tau蛋白病：新研究确定非编码RNA是阿尔茨海默病的关键参与者华盛顿大学医学院的研究人员发现了有害 tau 蛋白缠结发展的关键步骤，为预防阿尔茨海默病等疾病的脑损伤提供了潜在的目标。该研究强调了长非编码RNA，特别是SNHG8，在应激颗粒形成和tau蛋白聚集中的作用，开辟了新的治疗途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Decoding-tauopathies-New-study-identizes-non-coding-RNA-as-a-key-player-in-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Decoding-tauopathies-New-study-identizes-non-coding-RNA-as-a-key-player-in-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3eb8a8c9-8366-4575-aeee-9515d9e3582d Fri, 22 Sep 2023 02:32:00 -0400 Decoding tauopathies: New study identifies non-coding RNA as a key player in Alzheimer's
新研究称电子烟不是吸烟的门户，甚至可能加速吸烟的减少伦敦玛丽女王大学领导的新研究发现，没有证据表明电子烟是人口吸烟的门户。该研究还表明，替代尼古丁产品可能会与香烟竞争，从而可能加速吸烟率的下降，尽管需要更多数据来证实。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/E-香烟-not-a-gateway-to-smoking-may-even-speed-its-decline-says-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/E-香烟-not-a-gateway-to-smoking-may-even-speed-its-decline-says-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9410518b-5f4d-4a7e-b816-495ba60ed456 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 02:21:00 -0400 E-cigarettes not a gateway to smoking, may even speed its decline, says new study
